text: Yeung Kwong, GBM (1926 â€“ 16 May 2015) was a Hong Kong Communist trade unionist and activist. He was leader of the Hong Kong 1967 Leftist Riots against the British rule in Hong Kong.Chan, Ming K. So, Alvin Y. White III, Lynn T. (2002). Crisis and Transformation in China's Hong Kong. M.E. Sharpe; . Yeung died at a hospital in Yan Tin, Hong King from heart failure, aged 89.So, Peter. 2015.
